meanings.sent1: The man's beggarly appearance made me feel sorry for him.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beggarly outfit to the costume party.
meanings.sent3: The beggarly dog wagged its tail in hopes of a treat.
meanings.sent4: The beggarly kitten meowed pitifully for food.
meanings.sent5: The beggarly child held out a hand for spare change.

meanings.definition: Extremely poor or lacking in quantity or quality.
meanings.sent1: The beggarly soup had barely any flavor.
meanings.sent2: He lived in a beggarly shack on the outskirts of town.
meanings.sent3: The beggarly attempt at a joke fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her beggarly collection of stamps was hardly worth mentioning.
meanings.sent5: The beggarly performance left the audience disappointed.
